涆涆涆

涆字的基本解释

涆
hàn
〔涆涆〕（水）流得很急的样子。

涆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hàn］
［《集韻》侯旰切，去翰，匣。］
(1)见“涆涆”。
(2)见“浩涆”。

涆字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涆； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页626第04
【集韻】侯旰切，音翰。【玉篇】乾也。　又涆涆，水迅流貌。【左思·吳都賦】滮滮涆涆。　又與汗通。【郭璞·江賦】汗汗沺沺。　又【集韻】【韻會】?居案切，音旰。義同。

涆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
涆字的起名意思

暂无。

Wan
Basic explanation of words
Wan
hàn
〔Jianhuan〕 (Water) looks like it is flowing very quickly.
Wan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hàn］
["Ji Yun" Hou Jiqie, go to Han, Xia. ]
(1) See "Huhuan".
(2) See "Hao Huan".
Wan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　涆; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 626 04
[Jiyun] Hou Jiqie, Yinhan. [Jade articles] Dry it.　It's sluggish again, and the water is flowing quickly. 【Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu】Pan Pan Huan Huan.　Connect with Khan again. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] sweat and sweat.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club]? Juice cut, sound. The same meaning.
